tr.td: Mild Fever 2 days, chills 2 days, cough productive of greenish sputum 2 days
Proventil HFA Inhalation HFA Aerosol Inhaler 90 mcg/actuation

code.displayName: Proventil HFA Inhalation HFA Aerosol Inhaler 90 mcg/actuation

translation.displayName: 200 ACTUAT Albuterol 0.09 MG/ACTUAT Metered Dose Inhaler

tr.td: take 1 tablet (500 mg) by oral route every 12 hours for 14 days
take 2 tablets (50 mg) by oral route once daily for 30 days

tr.td: Patient may continue to experience low grade fever and chills
Return to clinic or call 911 if you experience chest pain, shortness of breath, high fevers, or intractable vomiting/diarrhea
Recommended Patient Decision Aids: Vendor supplied
